attributes.action: free prescriptions for long term illnesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that people with long term illnesses should have free prescriptions.
It shouldn't be just for the ppl who suffer with Diabetes and thyroid problems etc.
The other illnesses That should be included are Psoriasis, psoriatic arthritis, other athritis, Cancer Drugs, depression, Eczema and any other illnesses that are no fault of our own.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions in existence already:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/mentalillmeds/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
